text: It's not about memorization and getting a certification. To me, it's about learning a base of knowledge. Each week, we provide tech lessons, answer questions, and bring you interviews of the most successful engineers and thought leaders working in the IT space across technologies like data center, cloud, networking, collaboration, and security. Listen in as you'll gain insight, strategies, tips, and more to help you level up along your journey in becoming a rockstar SE. So let the class begin. All right, SE Nation. Let's get started. I am super excited to introduce my guest today, a former colleague of mine, and someone I highly respect in the industry, Lloyd Evans.

I highly respect in the industry, Lloyd Evans. Lloyd's been in the IT industry going on over 20 years, and he got his start actually as a programmer. But jumped into the networking side of the house early in his career. He holds a CCE in route switch and is currently working at Cisco Systems as a data center solutions consultant.
